评论详情: Great shirt for my husband, we dressed up for a 70's themed party. It was comfortable fit great and fun!

This is a fun shirt that I have worn to church, parties, and every where in between. It fits well and is very comfortable. It makes for an ice breaker because people enjoy seeing the vibrant colors. It washes well and comes out of the dryer wrinkle free.
The sizing is a bit large and loose to really disco down in, so keep that in mind when ordering. But the fabric feels great and it's colorful!
